t: Amazon Launches Its First B2B Private Label Brand
s: July 30, 2019 - AdAge reported today that Amazon recently launched the brand AmazonCommercial, a product line of bulk toilet paper, tissues and paper towels intended for a rapidly expanding B2B customer base - and its first foray into the Industrial category.
